plot: A miserable henpecked sci-fi film fan wishes that his shrewish and nagging wife was dead. The wife gets killed in an automobile accident, but comes back as a pesky rot-faced zombie.
title: Zombie Wife
plot_es: A miserable henpecked sci-fi film fan wishes that his shrewish and nagging wife was dead. The wife gets killed in an automobile accident, but comes back as a pesky rot-faced zombie.
plot_en: A miserable henpecked sci-fi film fan wishes that his shrewish and nagging wife was dead. The wife gets killed in an automobile accident, but comes back as a pesky rot-faced zombie.
